procedure.name: CPU1
procedure.statement: SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5',CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5',CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5',CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5',CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5',passwd+?) ) +?)) +?)) +?)) +?)) Z FROM cputable WHERE empid >= 1 AND empid <= 100) cputemp

procedure.name: CPU2
procedure.statement: SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5',CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5',CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5',CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5',CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5',passwd+?) ) +?)) +?)) +?)) +?)) Z FROM cputable WHERE empid >= 1 AND empid <= 100) cputemp
